title: Dana Gioia on Learning, Poetry, and Studying with Miss Bishop
description: Poet and author Dana Gioia talks about his book Studying with Miss Bishop with EconTalk host Russ Roberts. They talk about the craft of being a poet, the business world, mentorship, loss, why poetry no longer seems to matter, and how it might begin to matter again.
author: webmaster@econlib.org (EconTalk: Russ Roberts)
